title: Add frame-parameterized Korporus pictogram compatible with VideoML
description: Implement deterministic frame-driven pictogram component with props {frame,fps,className,style} and runtime RAF wrapper when frame is omitted; integrate into high-visibility page sections.

comments.author: ryan.porter
comments.text: Implemented KorporusFederationPictogram with frame/fps props, deterministic frame-derived animation state, and RAF-driven live mode when frame is omitted; integrated into high-visibility sections.
